QuakeExplorer is a R package used for the specific purpose of exploring earth quake data from the  NOAA (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration) Significant Earthquake dataset.  Data can be obtained from the NOAA at https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/nndc/struts/form?t=101650&s=1&d=1.
